tier.item: 'We went to the village and saw Ali and spoke with him, and came away
'We went to the village and saw Ali and spoke with him, and came away
Tu-li-kwenda mji-ni tu-ka-mw-ona Ali, tu-ka-sema na-ye, tu-ka-ondoka, tu-ka-rudi kwe-tu.
We went to the village and saw Ali and spoke with him, and came away and returned to our home.
